text: Andrei Vladimirovich Vasilyev (born March 30, 1972) is a professional ice hockey left winger. He was drafted in the eleventh round, 248th overall, by the New York Islanders in the 1992 NHL Entry Draft. He played sixteen games in the National Hockey League: fifteen over three seasons with the Islanders and one with the Phoenix Coyotes in the 1998–99 season. ==External links== * Category:1972 births Category:Avangard Omsk players Category:Berlin Capitals players Category:Denver Grizzlies players Category:Frankfurt Lions players Category:Grand Rapids Griffins (IHL) players Category:HC CSKA Moscow players Category:HC Khimik Voskresensk players Category:Metallurg Novokuznetsk players Category:Idaho Steelheads (ECHL) players Category:Las Vegas Thunder players Category:Linköping HC players Category:Living people Category:Long Beach Ice Dogs (IHL) players Category:Soviet ice hockey left wingers Category:New York Islanders draft picks Category:New York Islanders players Category:People from Voskresensk Category:Phoenix Coyotes players Category:Revier Löwen players Category:Russian ice hockey left wingers Category:Russian Penguins players Category:Utah Grizzlies (IHL) players
title: Andrei Vasilyev (ice hockey)
